description: ERECTION OF SINGLE STOREY REAR EXTENSION.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development to which this permission relates must be begun not later than the expiration of 5 years, beginning with the date of this permission.  Reason for condition: To comply with Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990.

Condition : 2 - No demolition or construction work in pursuance of this permission shall be carried on before 08.00 hours or after 18.00 hours on Mondays to Fridays inclusive, before 08.00 hours or after 13.00 hours on Saturdays, and at no time on Sundays or Bank Holidays.  Reason for condition: To safeguard the amenities of the occupiers of adjoining residential properties.

Condition : 3 - Details of the materials to be used for the external surfaces of the building/extension shall be submitted to and approved by the local Planning Authority before any work is commenced.  Reason for condition: To ensure a satisfactory appearance for the development.

Condition : 4 - Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning General Development Order 1988 (or any Order revoking or re-enacting this Order) no windows or other openings shall be formed in the flank elevations of the building without the prior approval of the Local Planning Authority. Reason for condition: To protect the privacy and amenities of the occupiers of adjoining residential properties.

Condition : 5 - All plant and machinery shall be enclosed and soundproofed in accordance with a scheme to be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority and such sound insulation shall be permanently maintained thereafter.  Reason for condition: In order to protect the amenities of nearby residents.

Condition : 6 - Details of the design, size, appearance, and colour to be used for the external surfaces of the extract duct hereby approved shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority before any work is commenced, the duct shall be fixed to the building using anti-vibration mountings to the satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority and the duct and fixings shall be permanently maintained thereafter. Reason for condition: To protect the visual amenities of the area and to safeguard the amenities of nearby residents.

Condition : 7 - The flat roof area of the extension/building hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony or sitting out area.  Reason for condition: To protect the privacy and amenities of the occupiers of adjoining residential properties.

Condition : 9 - INFORMATIVE:-  The applicant should seek to restrict the use of the upper floor accommodation to residential use ancillary to the permitted ground floor A3 restaurant only (ie. landlords accommodation) as opposed to a self-contained residential flat(s) as the nature of the ground floor A3 food and drink use together with the extensions hereby permitted would not, in the Council's view, provide for satisfactory upper floor residential accommodation in separate occupation.
